author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: Bitcoin Miner MARA Holdings Posts Record Block Wins, Produces 950 BTC in May
description: The company's bitcoin output rose 35% month-over-month, hitting its highest level since the 2024 halving.
content:
Bitcoin miner MARA Holdings (MARA) produced 950 BTC in May, a 35% increase from the previous month and its strongest output since the Bitcoin halving in April 2024, the company said Tuesday.
